data.lyric:
[ti:On Chill (feat. Jeremih) (Explicit)]
[ar:Wale/Jeremih]
[al:On Chill (feat. Jeremih) (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]On Chill (feat. Jeremih) (Explicit) - Wale/Jeremih
[00:01.95]Lyrics by：Eric Bellinger/Jeremy Felton/Olubawale Akintimehin
[00:03.90]Jeremih/Wale：
[00:10.63]We've been on a tragedy for months
[00:13.39]Why can't you agree with me for once
[00:16.98]Maybe we can be on chill tonight
[00:19.64]Maybe I can give you chills too
[00:21.80]We've been on a tragedy for months
[00:24.62]Why can't you agree with me for once yeah
[00:28.12]Maybe we can be on chill tonight
[00:30.52]One time
[00:30.93]Maybe I can give you chills too
[00:32.41]Chill
[00:32.93]Wale：
[00:33.30]I'm gettin' mine like fine wine measured in time
[00:36.23]Many other brothers loved you but this pleasure is mine
[00:38.98]It's no pressure for us to say that I love you for now
[00:41.62]So f**k that cuffin' s**t I just want us be comfortable now for real
[00:45.28]Who you lovin' who you wanna pull up with
[00:47.35]Who don't care who you dating long as you care and you trustin'
[00:50.14]I'm tryna hear all your problems so I can lighten the load
[00:52.80]No you not fighting alone 'cause I'm protectin' from 'em so chill
[00:56.58]Life hard and ex-lovers is like scars
[00:58.95]'Cause it stop hurtin' but never forgettin' what it was
[01:01.98]I was a youngin my biggest enemy was the club
[01:04.66]With voicemails on third rings f**king me up
[01:06.94]Jeremih/Wale：
[01:07.19]We've been on a tragedy for months
[01:08.08]So I don't trust
[01:09.47]Why can't you agree with me for once
[01:11.97]And I'm tryna slow up
[01:12.99]Maybe we can be on chill tonight
[01:15.87]Maybe I can give you chills too
[01:17.86]We've been on a tragedy for months
[01:20.75]Why can't you agree with me for once yeah
[01:24.25]Maybe we can be on chill tonight
[01:27.07]Maybe I can give you chills too
[01:28.38]Hey shawty look okay
[01:29.67]Wale：
[01:29.85]They switch up on you I'm gonna stay the same yeah
[01:32.62]I pull up on you then put it in with patience
[01:35.26]I'm good well we got it without no expectation
[01:38.04]What good is a title when shawty been that wave yeah
[01:40.64]Let me illustrate you let my tongue repaint you
[01:43.51]It's already waxed have you had a brainstorm
[01:46.30]Everywhere a n***a take you just know that my face good
[01:49.12]Modify your energy so your bank and your skin glow
[01:51.91]Maxfield let it fly I be up in there a lot
[01:54.69]Just to show I don't care gon' wear it to that n***a house
[01:57.60]We don't share our whereabouts or the gossip the hood love
[02:00.37]Just supreme confidence if we good that's good enough woah yeah
[02:03.15]Jeremih：
[02:03.27]We've been on a tragedy for months
[02:05.71]Why can't you agree with me for once
[02:09.22]Maybe we can be on chill tonight
[02:11.93]Maybe I can give you chills too
[02:14.02]We've been on a tragedy for months
[02:16.90]Why can't you agree with me for once yeah
[02:20.31]Maybe we can be on chill tonight
[02:23.18]Maybe I can give you chills too
[02:25.07]Jeremih：
[02:25.20]How 'bout that oh
[02:27.25]I'm tired of makin' up and fallin' out
[02:30.53]Wanna be the n***a you callin' up
[02:32.81]To pick your body up when you down and out let's chill
[02:36.12]How 'bout that oh
[02:38.55]I'm tired of makin' up and fallin' out
[02:41.84]Wanna be the n***a you callin' up
[02:44.06]To pick your body up when you down and out let's chill
[02:47.45]Jeremih：
[02:47.79]We've been on a tragedy for months
[02:50.56]Why can't you agree with me for once
[02:54.10]Maybe we can be on chill tonight
[02:56.82]Maybe I can give you chills too
[02:58.94]We've been on a tragedy for months
[03:01.75]Why can't you agree with me for once yeah
[03:05.36]Maybe we can be on chill tonight
[03:08.08]Maybe I can give you chills too
[03:09.63]Eric Bellinger：
[03:09.88]You give me oh
[03:15.84]Just be there and then
data.trans:
[ti:On Chill (feat. Jeremih) (Explicit)]
[ar:Wale/Jeremih]
[al:On Chill (feat. Jeremih) (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:01.95]//
[00:03.90]//
[00:10.63]几个月以来 我们饱受煎熬 心痛不已
[00:13.39]为何你不能迁就我 哪怕一次也好
[00:16.98]也许我们今晚可以轻松一下
[00:19.64]也许我可以让你放松下来
[00:21.80]几个月以来 我们饱受煎熬 心痛不已
[00:24.62]为何你不能迁就我 哪怕一次也好
[00:28.12]也许我们今晚可以轻松一下
[00:30.52]//
[00:30.93]也许我可以让你放松下来
[00:32.41]//
[00:32.93]//
[00:33.30]我要俘虏你 就像佳酿需要时间的洗礼
[00:36.23]许多人爱你 可这乐趣只属于我
[00:38.98]如今说我爱你 对你我而言毫无压力
[00:41.62]别管那些瞎话 说真的 我现在只想轻松一点
[00:45.28]你喜欢谁 你想去找谁
[00:47.35]只要你关心 信任他 谁会在意你和哪个人约会
[00:50.14]我试图聆听你的烦心事 我可以减轻负担
[00:52.80]你不是孤军奋战 我保护着你 让你免受伤害
[00:56.58]生活不易 前任就像伤疤
[00:58.95]即使他们不再让你伤心 可你无法忘记锥心之痛
[01:01.98]我少不更事的时候 最大的敌人是夜店
[01:04.66]语音信箱响个不停 让我心烦意乱
[01:06.94]//
[01:07.19]几个月以来 我们饱受煎熬 心痛不已
[01:08.08]因此我不相信
[01:09.47]为何你不能迁就我 哪怕一次也好
[01:11.97]我试图放慢脚步
[01:12.99]也许我们今晚可以轻松一下
[01:15.87]也许我可以让你放松下来
[01:17.86]几个月以来 我们饱受煎熬 心痛不已
[01:20.75]为何你不能迁就我 哪怕一次也好
[01:24.25]也许我们今晚可以轻松一下
[01:27.07]也许我可以让你放松下来
[01:28.38]小妞 听着
[01:29.67]//
[01:29.85]他们在你面前花样百出 而我始终如一
[01:32.62]我慢慢靠近你 耐心地让你心满意足
[01:35.26]我很厉害 我们得到一切是预料之中
[01:38.04]多么好的头衔 当美女蜂拥而至的时候
[01:40.64]让我证明 热情拥吻 带你领略新世界
[01:43.51]沉醉不已 你有大胆想象过吗
[01:46.30]所有和你眉目传情的人都知道我魅力四射
[01:49.12]让你振奋精神 金钱 美丽的外表双管齐下
[01:51.91]天空海阔 自由翱翔 我无拘无束
[01:54.69]只是为了表现我的不屑 去那个家伙的破房子里
[01:57.60]我们不愿透露行踪 也不想流言蜚语满天飞
[02:00.37]满怀信心 只要我们幸福 那就心满意足
[02:03.15]//
[02:03.27]几个月以来 我们饱受煎熬 心痛不已
[02:05.71]为何你不能迁就我 哪怕一次也好
[02:09.22]也许我们今晚可以轻松一下
[02:11.93]也许我可以让你放松下来
[02:14.02]几个月以来 我们饱受煎熬 心痛不已
[02:16.90]为何你不能迁就我 哪怕一次也好 yeah
[02:20.31]也许我们今晚可以轻松一下
[02:23.18]也许我可以让你放松下来
[02:25.07]//
[02:25.20]那会如何
[02:27.25]我厌倦了谎言和争吵
[02:30.53]想要成为你心心念念的那个人
[02:32.81]当你情绪低落的时候 让你振作 我们尽情释放
[02:36.12]那会如何
[02:38.55]我厌倦了谎言和争吵
[02:41.84]想要成为你心心念念的那个人
[02:44.06]当你情绪低落的时候 让你振作 我们尽情释放
[02:47.45]//
[02:47.79]几个月以来 我们饱受煎熬 心痛不已
[02:50.56]为何你不能迁就我 哪怕一次也好
[02:54.10]也许我们今晚可以轻松一下
[02:56.82]也许我可以让你放松下来
[02:58.94]几个月以来 我们饱受煎熬 心痛不已
[03:01.75]为何你不能迁就我 哪怕一次也好
[03:05.36]也许我们今晚可以轻松一下
[03:08.08]也许我可以让你放松下来
[03:09.63]//
[03:09.88]把你托付于我
[03:15.84]一切安好
